author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Goyert: As you are my official translator in Germany voil√† une histoire pour vous. The Frankfurter Zeitung (19 July 1931) published Vielleicht ein Traum, a fragment by J.J. author of Ulysses, with an editorial note to say it is translated from the English MS by Irene Kafka. I do not know either the editor or Irene Kafka. I never had any such MS. and I never wrote the text or anything like it. ??? Sincerely yours James Joyce PS. I have nobody to read your handwriting here so please reply by typed letter. J.J.
